content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: mossy_cobblestone_wall
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 55, "index": 15}, {"type": "chainmail_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "compass", "quantity": 23, "index": 25}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 21, "index": 31}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone", "quantity": 6, "index": 34}, {"type": "red_carpet", "quantity": 32, "index": 35}, {"type": "brain_coral_block", "quantity": 7, "index": 40}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 55, "index": 41}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 60, "index": 43}]

thought: The mossy_cobblestone_wall recipe requires 6 mossy_cobblestones arranged in a 2x3 pattern on the crafting grid. Therefore, I will start by moving one mossy_cobblestone from slot 34 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: mossy_cobblestone_wall
inventory=[{"type": "mossy_cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 55, "index": 15}, {"type": "chainmail_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "compass", "quantity": 23, "index": 25}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 21, "index": 31}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone", "quantity": 5, "index": 34}, {"type": "red_carpet", "quantity": 32, "index": 35}, {"type": "brain_coral_block", "quantity": 7, "index": 40}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 55, "index": 41}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 60, "index": 43}]
thought: I have already placed one mossy_cobblestone in slot 1, therefore I will place another in slot 2 (to its right).
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: mossy_cobblestone_wall
inventory=[{"type": "mossy_cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 55, "index": 15}, {"type": "chainmail_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "compass", "quantity": 23, "index": 25}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 21, "index": 31}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone", "quantity": 4, "index": 34}, {"type": "red_carpet", "quantity": 32, "index": 35}, {"type": "brain_coral_block", "quantity": 7, "index": 40}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 55, "index": 41}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 60, "index": 43}]
thought: I have already placed two mossy_cobblestones in slots 1 and 2, therefore I will place another in slot 3 (to the right of slot 2).
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 3 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 4 with quantity 1
